words.tran_cn: 编织；把…编成辫（等于pleat）；给…打褶

trans.tran_en: a length of something, usually hair, that has been plaited
to twist three long pieces of hair or rope over and under each other to make one long piece

trans.tran_cn: 把…编成辫绳，给…打褶，编织
